tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE humanitarian_supplies (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name STRING,
  quantity INT,
  location STRING,
  supplier_name STRING,
  delivery_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE procurement (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    vendor VARCHAR(255),
    delivery_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE supplies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE supplier (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE procurement (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE location (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255)
)
